scripts.build:docs: yarn build:docs:root && yarn workspaces foreach -v run build:docs
scripts.build:docs:root: pandoc -dpandoc.yml README.md -o gh-pages/index.html && cp -r docs gh-pages
scripts.gh-pages: rimraf 'gh-pages/*' && yarn build:docs && yarn build:docs:root && cp -r p5-analysis/build/docs gh-pages/p5-analysis && cp -r p5-server/build/docs gh-pages/p5-server
scripts.test: yarn workspace p5-analysis build && yarn workspaces foreach -tv run test
